com.djammr.westernknights.entity.systems

Class InputSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.ashley.core.EntitySystem
      • com.badlogic.ashley.systems.IteratingSystem
        • com.djammr.westernknights.entity.systems.InputSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InputObserver

    public class InputSystem
extends com.badlogic.ashley.systems.IteratingSystem
implements InputObserver
    Executes commands best on input events from an InputObservable
    This should ideally act as a Controller type object for specific Components
